pages.text: $(l)Modular Force Field Systems$() (or MFFS) is a mod that adds $(3)force fields$(), $(5)high tech machinery$() and $(6)defensive measures$() to Minecraft. Ever tired of nuclear explosions blowing up your house or want to keep people out of your secret bases? Say no more, $(l)we've got you covered!$()
An overview of MFFS Force Field technology

Force fields can be used for a myriad of things, including: $(li)Keeping intruders out of your house$(li)Building structures$(li)Creating underwater bases or airlocks$(li)Exterminating approaching mobs$(li)Capturing enemies in traps$(li)Protecting against ballistic missiles$(li)Confiscating items from players$()

MFFS also features configuration options that can $(3)remove its dependency on electrical energy$(), making it usable within vanilla Minecraft or in combination with other mods. MFFS is most commonly used in $(2)multi-player$() worlds, but certainly provides many benefits for $(2)single-player$() as well.
